adDetails: I am an individual professional academic writer who is well versed in APA, MLA, and other academic citation formats. I have written for all levels of client including ivy league and institutional corporations. The majority of my clients are repeat customers but I am currently accepting new assignments. My rates are $30 per page (250 words) for drafting and $7 per page for editing and grammatical correction. ESLs please contact me. Professional/Discreet/Quality Thank you.
